function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inclusion of only five sensors may limit the comprehensive monitoring of environmental parameters and miss potential risks to human health.","Impact":"Incomplete monitoring may lead to undetected environmental pollutants or conditions that could pose health risks to occupants.","Mitigation":"Consider including additional sensors for comprehensive monitoring of environmental parameters and health risks.","Technologies":"Advanced sensor integration technologies for cost-effective and comprehensive environmental monitoring.","People":"Building occupants, especially those susceptible to environmental pollutants or conditions.","Owner":"Researchers, designers, and manufacturers of the IBEM hardware."},{"Description":"Exclusion of sensors for chemical pollutants and noise levels may lead to undetected exposure to harmful substances and inadequate assessment of acoustic impacts on IEQ.","Impact":"Potential exposure to harmful chemical pollutants and inadequate understanding of noise-related impacts on occupant comfort and health.","Mitigation":"Integrate sensors for chemical pollutants and noise levels to provide a more comprehensive assessment of indoor environmental quality.","Technologies":"Advanced chemical and acoustic sensors with high specificity and accuracy.","People":"Building occupants, particularly those at risk from exposure to chemical pollutants and noise-related impacts.","Owner":"Research and development teams responsible for hardware design and integration."}]}
